EMAIL.EMAIL_IN_USE: The email address is already in use.
EMAIL.EMAIL_NOT_FOUND: No account is associated to this e-mail address.

PASSWORD.PASSWORD_MIN_LENGTH: The password has to have at least 12 characters.

REPEATED_PASSWORD.REPEATED_PASSWORD_NO_MATCH: The repeated password doesn't match the password.

NOT_FOUND.TITLE: Page Not Found
NOT_FOUND.MESSAGE: The page that you are trying to access does not exists.

REGISTER.REGISTRATION_SUCCESSFUL: Registration successful. An e-mail has been sent to your adress. Please consult it in order to confirm your account.

ERRORS.ACCOUNT_CREATION: Impossible to create your account. Try again later.

REGISTER_CONFIRM.TITLE: Account Confirmation
REGISTER_CONFIRM.SUCCESS: Your account has been confirmed. You are going to be redirected...

PASSWORD_FORGOTTEN.TITLE: Password Forgotten
PASSWORD_FORGOTTEN.ENTER_EMAIL: Enter your e-mail address below in order to recover your account.
PASSWORD_FORGOTTEN.SUCCESS: An email has been sent to this adress. Please consult it in order to recover your account.

ERRORS.ALREADY_RECOVERING: A recovery procedure is already is progress.

RESET_PASSWORD.TITLE: Reset Password
RESET_PASSWORD.ENTER_PASSWORD: Enter your new password below in order to reset it.
RESET_PASSWORD.SUCCESS: Your password has been changed. You are going to be redirected...

ERRORS.INVALID_TOKEN: Impossible to set a new password.

SUCCESS.EMAIL: The e-mail address has been updated.
